description: React component for rendering a product price trend chart using Recharts library. It displays price history data for a selected product, with conditional rendering based on props and data availability.

methods.name: ProductChart({ product, data = [], enabled = true })
methods.description: Functional React component that renders a line chart to show price history of a product, with conditional UI elements based on product and data presence.
